div.p: Dear Sir: - If within your power will you kindly fill out the following blank concerning Margaret B. Crozier, who was formerly a pupil of Salem Female Academy, and return it to me? My object is to obtain this short record of the subsequent life of each girl who has been a pupil within that widely known and honored Institution.
